forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
